title: 148864151.just Because Youre An Expert In Something
excerpt: …doesn’t mean their an expert in something else.

children.text: …doesn’t mean their an expert in something else.
Financial advisors don’t make good doctors.
Dog trainers aren’t the same as vets.
And not many architects know much about product design.
Discerning the difference between what someone is good at versus what they aren’t is a great way to avoid to the mistake of taking advice from the wrong person.
